context_bundle.content:
Modular monolith architecture.

Concept:
Single deployment unit with well-defined module boundaries.

Module Rules:
- Modules communicate via public APIs
- No direct database access across modules
- Async communication preferred
- Clear ownership boundaries

Structure:
/modules
  /orders (own DB schema)
  /inventory (own DB schema)
  /payments (own DB schema)
/shared (common utilities only)

Benefits:
- Simpler deployment than microservices
- Clear boundaries for future split
- Easier debugging
- Lower operational complexity

Evolution:
Can extract modules to microservices when needed.
